entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 26 with temperature falling to minus 31 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 26 with temperature falling to minus 31 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
